caption:
“The Spirit prays where words end.”

Reflection:
When language fails, love continues. In the hush beyond speech, the soul communes with God.

Commentary:
This quote speaks to prayer beyond expression — when the heart’s ache becomes its own sacred language. Silence becomes intercession.
